22g PROTEIN
Banana Bread

SIMPLE PROTEIN BANANA BREAD RECIPE

A straightforward and delicious protein banana bread recipe with 22g of protein.

22g
Protein
200
Calories
35m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 slice

Carbs18g
Fat7g
Fiber3g
Sugar10g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 180g ripe bananas
  • 90g vanilla whey protein
  • 100g all-purpose flour
  • 1 large egg
  • 50ml milk
  • 40g brown sugar
  • 1.5 tsp baking powder
  • 0.5 tsp cinnamon

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat Oven

Preheat oven to 180¬∞C (350¬∞F). Grease a loaf pan.

2

Mash Bananas

In a bowl, mash the bananas with a fork.

3

Mix Ingredients

Add the egg, milk, and brown sugar to the bananas and mix well. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, protein powder, baking powder, and cinnamon. Add the dry ingredients to the wet and stir until just combined.

4

Pour and Bake

Pour the batter into the loaf pan.

5

Bake

Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a skewer inserted into the center comes out clean.

6

Cool

Let it cool before slicing.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
